nctu.description: 免費便當！想要的人可以來拿喔！地點在人社院。
nctu.location: 人社院 - 一樓交誼廳
nctu.note: 系上活動結束剩下的便當，有素食和葷食，先到先得！
nctu.image: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 100 100'%3E%3Crect width='100' height='100' fill='%23e0e0e0'/%3E%3Ctext x='50' y='50' font-family='Arial' font-size='12' fill='%23808080' text-anchor='middle' dominant-baseline='middle'%3E便當照片%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

nctu.description: 多買的水果組合，有蘋果、香蕉和橘子，歡迎來拿！
nctu.note: 水果都很新鮮，請自備袋子！
nctu.image: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 100 100'%3E%3Crect width='100' height='100' fill='%23e0e0e0'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='30' cy='50' r='10' fill='%23ff9999'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='50' cy='50' r='10' fill='%23ffff99'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='70' cy='50' r='10' fill='%23ffcc99'/%3E%3Ctext x='50' y='50' font-family='Arial' font-size='12' fill='%23808080' text-anchor='middle' dominant-baseline='middle'%3E水果照片%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

nctu.description: 多買的滷味，有滷蛋和豆干，請自備容器！
nctu.location: 工程館 - 一樓休息區
nctu.note: 滷味還熱的，請盡快來拿！
nctu.image: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 100 100'%3E%3Crect width='100' height='100' fill='%23e0e0e0'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='30' cy='50' r='10' fill='%238B4513'/%3E%3Crect x='50' y='40' width='30' height='20' rx='5' fill='%238B4513'/%3E%3Ctext x='50' y='50' font-family='Arial' font-size='12' fill='%23808080' text-anchor='middle' dominant-baseline='middle'%3E滷味照片%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

nccu.description: 多買的麵包和蛋糕，歡迎來拿！
nccu.location: 政大書院 - 一樓大廳
nccu.note: 麵包和蛋糕都是今天買的，很新鮮！
nccu.image: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 100 100'%3E%3Crect width='100' height='100' fill='%23e0e0e0'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='30' cy='50' r='15' fill='%23DEB887'/%3E%3Crect x='50' y='35' width='30' height='30' rx='5' fill='%23FFB6C1'/%3E%3Ctext x='50' y='50' font-family='Arial' font-size='12' fill='%23808080' text-anchor='middle' dominant-baseline='middle'%3E麵包和蛋糕照片%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

nccu.description: 多買的飲料，有奶茶和咖啡，請自備杯子！
nccu.location: 商學院 - 一樓休息區
nccu.note: 飲料都是冰的，請盡快來拿！
nccu.image: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 100 100'%3E%3Crect width='100' height='100' fill='%23e0e0e0'/%3E%3Crect x='30' y='30' width='15' height='40' rx='2' fill='%23A0522D'/%3E%3Crect x='55' y='30' width='15' height='40' rx='2' fill='%238B4513'/%3E%3Ctext x='50' y='50' font-family='Arial' font-size='12' fill='%23808080' text-anchor='middle' dominant-baseline='middle'%3E飲料照片%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

nccu.description: 多買的便當，有雞肉和豬肉口味，請自備餐具！
nccu.location: 文學院 - 一樓交誼廳
nccu.note: 便當還熱的，請盡快來拿！
nccu.image: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 100 100'%3E%3Crect width='100' height='100' fill='%23e0e0e0'/%3E%3Crect x='20' y='30' width='60' height='40' rx='5' fill='%23DEB887'/%3E%3Crect x='25' y='35' width='50' height='30' rx='3' fill='%23FFA07A'/%3E%3Ctext x='50' y='50' font-family='Arial' font-size='12' fill='%23808080' text-anchor='middle' dominant-baseline='middle'%3E便當照片%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E
